Great classic relaxing game that I play after a stressful game of CSGO.  The reason I do not recommend this game is because mostly every server is ran by a bunch of southern old white dudes who think they are actual WWII veterans.  The assholes who run this games servers rule it with an iron fist and will literally have a cow if you break one of their many over the top pedantic server rules.  I got yelled at for swinging my shovel in spawn and my cousin got yelled at for killing a guy from a certain area in the map that was apparently "off limits" due to the low player count on the server.  These bullshit rules from this archaic, nearly dead community prohibits players from what, playing all over the map? So yeah, the game is boomer paradise and nearly everyone in this game are a bunch of overly sensitive grandpas who will kick you if you fire you rifle in spawn.  If you can look past the old, archaic, bitch ass community who gets triggered for anything, then this game is very good.  I just would't recommend it to a newcomer.
I play I say heil hitler in the mic and I get kicken instantly quite disapointing

ещё хуже чем контер страйк, на голд сурсе было раз в 30 лучше, сурс крайне отвратный, все сервера с онлайном + норм пингом это говно режимы такие как гг, подрыв точек и ещё пара.
оружие самое настоящее дерьмо с которого не возможно нормально стрелять,   могу дать гайд как набить фраги, ставим огромную сенсу, берём пулимёт и на похуй стреляем от бедра ведя мышку плавно вниз.
покупайте или качайте дод на голд сурсе, там всё хорошо.
Ce jeu est incroyable !

The Source FPS that keeps on giving, after a decade online you can still get mature player communities, great banter, game play that never ages, and most importantly not  scrap of pay to win anywhere.

holds up in 2020
great blend of realism and fun
uh hello

This game gets annoying really fast. Some things like splash damage are really inconsistent and hard to get used to. All of the current servers are either people who have specific names (since some servers require you to change your name so you can play with a rank/ID for maximum 
realism) and the people who have no clue what they're doing.

Back in the day it was fine, but now it's just empty. Also, some of the community maps are trash due to technical issues and other problems, yet they're used anyway. This game is full of toxic cheaters, too. VAC doesn't do anything. You WILL encounter hacks. I can't say enough how much I hate this game. This game is just a pile of nice smelling trash.

Fantastic game. A better WWII game than any of the Call of Duty games, and it's probably my favorite out of the bunch. It's technically a port of the [url=https://store.steampowered.com/app/30/Day_of_Defeat/]original[/url], but I'd recommend this over it, as it's nearly identical, has better graphics, is more compatible with modern hardware, has achievements, and trading card support.

Oyun eğlenceli, 2.dünya savaşı atmosferinde güzel bir multiplayer deneyimi sunuyor. Eğer bu Source oyununu edinirseniz halihazırda oynayan birçok oyuncu var. Oyun gayet seri ilerliyor sizi gereksiz bekletmiyor. Grafikler biraz kötü gelebilir fakat dönemine göre değerlendirmek lazım. Düşük sistemli bir bilgisayarda bile akıcı olarak çalışmaktadır.

Наконец-то я добрался до этого великолепного детища от Valve. В этой войнушке прекрасно всё! Начиная от всеми любимой тематики Второй Мировой Войны и заканчивая дружелюбным и адекватным контингентом на серверах. По началу было трудновато, но к стрельбе и физике быстро привыкаешь. Игра затягивает. Ни разу не пожалел, что скачал. Рекомендую!
good fps game
Para pasar el rato de chill esta muy bien :)
I like it ah lot

I can barely form words after the ending of this game. I will never spoil it for people who have not gotten there yet, so I wont go further into it. The graphics were absolutely stunning, and the Source Engine has been changed for the better. Comparing Source with GoldSrc is like Quake II's Engine with GoldSrc. Stunning difference! Physics are still wonky from time to time, but this made me appreciate it even more. Just like old times! All in all, for any DOD and Valve fan, this is a MUST! If you don't have a VR to play it, go grab a cheaper one and experience it for yourself. You DON'T NEED an Index to play this game! If you're sure VR is not your thing, go watch a play through on YouTube and support Valve to keep encouraging them to make more games like Half-Life, Portal and Left 4 Dead. They seem to have their spark back, and by the gods the STILL have what it takes to make masterpiece games. This final message, though I know they will never see it, is a Thank you to Valve. Thank you for making this game. Thank you for taking me back to a time where I discovered this series. And thank you for continuing to influence my life with all the things you have done for us! Please keep making games, and Thank you so much!

Jesus... I kind of just impulsively bought this but damn did this game teach me to trust my impulses. 

I really don't know what I was expecting. I looked to see if people still play this game and they do, so I bought it.

I came from games like Red Orchestra 2 and Hell Let Loose and playing this game on paper seems like a straight downgrade and a wormhole back to 2005. 

But it wasn't. I really enjoyed it and I still sometimes play this game when "there's nothing else to play." 

10/10.

WW2 temalı multiplayer bir oyun . Oyunda taraflar A.B.D ve mihver devletler olarak geçmektedir . 2.Dünya savaşının geçtiği yerlere uyarlanmış mapler ve ya lego maplerde oynayabilirsiniz . Grfikler kötü olsa bile WW2 ruhunu hissediyorsunuz ve oyuna bağlanıyorsunuz tavsiyem diğer modları bırakıp yaşnızca gungame oynamanız ama tabii size kalmış

My all time FAVORITE game!
一款挺欢乐的游戏（放屁），游戏里很多大佬常驻，所以上手难了点，打惯了平时fps游戏的人肯定会选择自动武器，但是自动武器要压好还是有不小压力的。除此之外可以连国服玩，基本周末或晚上都有人在玩。说闪退和进不去的可以创建桌面快捷方式进入，说没有机器人的可以去下个rcbot2机器人插件，贴吧也有相应的资源和教程。只能说游戏是好游戏，但是已经有些过时了。
